players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Keep an eye on Diana as she might be the Detective."
Diana: "I believe Charlie is the Mafioso and I think we should lynch him. He's already confessed to killing Alice, which makes me suspicious of his intentions."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
